summary: This is a service request record from the Federal Bureau of Prisons (FBOP) Metropolitan Correctional Center (MCC) in New York, dated September 9, 2019. It documents a request to move recording equipment (AMS and SVRs) to the computer services server room to enable full-time access, requiring a serial number to obtain a new IP address for the new location. The request was marked as an emergency and assigned to technicians Jeff Cranor, Jeff McKenzie, and Justin Houston.

events.title: Service Request for Recording Equipment Move
events.description: An emergency service request was created to move AMS and SVR recording equipment to the computer services server room at FBOP MCC New York for full-time access, requiring a serial number to obtain a new IP address.

keyFacts: The document is a service request from the Federal Bureau of Prisons Metropolitan Correctional Center (FBOP MCC) in New York, dated September 9, 2019.
The request was to move 'AMS and SVRs' (likely recording equipment) to the computer services server room to enable 'full time access'.
The request was marked as an emergency, requiring a call to a specific number (844-802-0188).
The move required obtaining the serial number of a temporary decoder to get a new IP address for the equipment in its new location.
